title: Cate Blanchett’s ‘Tár’ Puts Mahler in the Spotlight
description: The Austrian composer’s Symphony No. 5 is the obsession of the conductor played by Cate Blanchett — and of the fans of her latest film.
dc:creator: Louis Lucero II
media:credit: Photo illustration by Kyle Berger for The New York Times
media:description: Mahler’s Fifth, first performed in 1904, is having a 21st-century resurgence.
